nodes.text: An unnamed senator represented Bilbringi in the New Republic Senate. In 12 ABY, he requested the New Republic send a communications team to the mining colony of Artus Prime, which had gone silent.
In 28 ABY, another unnamed, possibly identical, senator from Bilbringi was bribed by Lando Calrissian during the Chief of State election. This senator sat on the Defense Council.
The N.R.I. Reports and The New Jedi Order: Destiny's Way were both released in 2002. This indicated that the unnamed politician is presumably a running gag.
